# vendor_code

**Instance Property**

All kernel events that don't match this vendor code will be ignored. KEV_ANY_VENDOR can be used to receive kernel events with any vendor code.

## Declaration

```swift
u_int32_t vendor_code;
```

## Fields

- **total_size**: Total size of the kernel event message including the header.
- **kev_class**: All kernel events that don't match this class will be ignored. KEV_ANY_CLASS can be used to receive kernel events with any class.
- **kev_subclass**: All kernel events that don't match this subclass will be ignored. KEV_ANY_SUBCLASS can be used to receive kernel events with any subclass.
